name: Rogue
lore: Masters of stealth and cunning, Rogues excel in the arts of deception and precision.

subclasses.name: Assassin
subclasses.description: Masters of infiltration and lethal strikes, Assassins eliminate targets swiftly and silently.

subclasses.name: Thief
subclasses.description: Experts in stealth and agility, Thieves excel in acquiring and utilizing others' possessions.

subclasses.name: Arcane Trickster
subclasses.description: Blending magic with trickery, Arcane Tricksters wield spells to befuddle and deceive their enemies.
